summary:
A large, dark cavern housing a malignant force.

ALPHA WIP & MODDER RESOURCE CURRENTLY
descriptionHtml:
The Crucible is a painstakingly handcrafted series of caverns. There are very few tile-set constructed rooms- this is to give the dungeon an organic, novel feel.
My original intent was to have it be a sort of witches' coven. I imagine it would also be a good troll dungeon. I hope to see someone else's take on it, and their refinements. This is my first attempt at a dungeon and any feedback would be greatly appreciated.

Important notes:
-THERE IS NO DOOR CURRENTLY ----->COC aaaCrucible<----- is the only way to enter
-Most of the "main" area is navmeshed.
-There are a couple places that errors in the geometry can be observed in normal play, but they are few and far between. The skylight openings are intended for extra waterfalls and "sunlight" beams, if desired.
-The player is intended to start at the top of the highest waterfall. A short drop leads to a ledge and from there the player may walk down two separate paths.
-There is room for expansion, if desired. I will be "caving in" the door-into-space, as I cannot fathom navmeshing any more than already required.
author: Xarekis

files.name: Crucible 0.705
files.changelogHtml:
Added a dining area, as well as makeshift sleeping and cooking arrangements
Additional lighting tweaks
Sacrificial altar, alchemy & enchanting station added
Misc clutter
